com.hp.autonomy.iod.client.api

Interface IdolOnDemandService


  • public interface IdolOnDemandService
    Service for calling IDOL OnDemand APIs which do not have a dedicated service. These methods provide no assistance with calling IDOL OnDemand, so prefer dedicated services where available

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ASYNC_URL 
      static String SYNC_URL 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Sends a GET request to the given API
      JobId getAsync(String api, Map<String,Object> params)
      Sends a GET request to the given API asynchronously
      JobStatus<Map<String,Object>> getJobResult(JobId jobId)
      Get the result of an AddToTextIndex job using an API key provided by a RequestInterceptor
      JobStatus<Map<String,Object>> getJobResult(String apiKey, JobId jobId)
      Get the result of an AddToTextIndex job using an API key provided by a RequestInterceptor
      JobStatus<Map<String,Object>> getJobStatus(JobId jobId)
      Gets that status of a job using an API key provided by a RequestInterceptor

    • Method Detail

      • get

        @GET(value="/api/sync/{api}/v1")
Map<String,Object> get(@Path(value="api")
                         String api,
                         @QueryMap
                         Map<String,Object> params)
                       throws IodErrorException
        Sends a GET request to the given API
        Parameters:
        api - The name of the API
        params - The query parameters sent to the API. These should include an API key if not using a RequestInterceptor
        Returns:
        A Map representing the result from IDOL OnDemand
        Throws:
        IodErrorException

      • getAsync

        @GET(value="/api/async/{api}/v1")
JobId getAsync(@Path(value="api")
                 String api,
                 @QueryMap
                 Map<String,Object> params)
               throws IodErrorException
        Sends a GET request to the given API asynchronously
        Parameters:
        api - The name of the API
        params - The query parameters sent to the API. These should include an API key if not using a RequestInterceptor
        Returns:
        The job ID of the request
        Throws:
        IodErrorException

      • post

        @POST(value="/api/sync/{api}/v1")
@Multipart
Map<String,Object> post(@Path(value="api")
                                     String api,
                                     @PartMap
                                     Map<String,Object> params)
                        throws IodErrorException
        Sends a POST request to the given API
        Parameters:
        api - The name of the API
        params - The query parameters sent to the API. These should include an API key if not using a RequestInterceptor
        Returns:
        A Map representing the result from IDOL OnDemand
        Throws:
        IodErrorException

      • postAsync

        @POST(value="/api/async/{api}/v1")
@Multipart
JobId postAsync(@Path(value="api")
                             String api,
                             @PartMap
                             Map<String,Object> params)
                throws IodErrorException
        Sends a POST request to the given API asynchronously
        Parameters:
        api - The name of the API
        params - The query parameters sent to the API. These should include an API key if not using a RequestInterceptor
        Returns:
        A Map representing the result from IDOL OnDemand
        Throws:
        IodErrorException

      • getJobStatus

        @GET(value="/job/status/{jobId}")
JobStatus<Map<String,Object>> getJobStatus(@Path(value="jobId")
                                             JobId jobId)
                                           throws IodErrorException
        Gets that status of a job using an API key provided by a RequestInterceptor
        Parameters:
        jobId - The ID of the job
        Returns:
        An object containing the status of the job along with the result if the job has finished
        Throws:
        IodErrorException

      • getJobStatus

        @GET(value="/job/status/{jobId}")
JobStatus<Map<String,Object>> getJobStatus(@Query(value="apiKey")
                                             String apiKey,
                                             @Path(value="jobId")
                                             JobId jobId)
                                           throws IodErrorException
        Gets that status of a job using the given API key
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key to use to authenticate the request
        jobId - The ID of the job
        Returns:
        An object containing the status of the job along with the result if the job has finished
        Throws:
        IodErrorException

      • getJobResult

        @GET(value="/job/result/{jobId}")
JobStatus<Map<String,Object>> getJobResult(@Path(value="jobId")
                                             JobId jobId)
                                           throws IodErrorException
        Get the result of an AddToTextIndex job using an API key provided by a RequestInterceptor
        Parameters:
        jobId - The id of the job
        Returns:
        An object containing the result of the job
        Throws:
        IodErrorException - If an error occurred retrieving the result

      • getJobResult

        @GET(value="/job/result/{jobId}")
JobStatus<Map<String,Object>> getJobResult(@Query(value="apiKey")
                                             String apiKey,
                                             @Path(value="jobId")
                                             JobId jobId)
                                           throws IodErrorException
        Get the result of an AddToTextIndex job using an API key provided by a RequestInterceptor
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key to use to authenticate the request
        jobId - The id of the job
        Returns:
        An object containing the result of the job
        Throws:
        IodErrorException - If an error occurred retrieving the result
